title_full: MLREL01-BP01 Design ML pipelines for fault tolerance and recovery
title: Design ML pipelines for fault tolerance and recovery
description: Design ML pipelines to handle failures gracefully with automatic retry mechanisms and checkpointing. Use SageMaker managed spot training with checkpoints to resume interrupted training jobs. Implement idempotent pipeline steps to enable safe retries without data corruption.

title_full: MLREL01-BP02 Implement data validation and schema enforcement
title: Implement data validation and schema enforcement
description: Validate input data against expected schemas before training and inference to prevent pipeline failures from malformed data. Use AWS Glue Data Catalog or Amazon SageMaker Feature Store to maintain schema definitions. Implement data quality gates that halt pipelines when validation fails.

title_full: MLREL02-BP01 Deploy inference endpoints across multiple Availability Zones
title: Deploy inference endpoints across multiple Availability Zones
description: Configure SageMaker endpoints to deploy across multiple Availability Zones for high availability. Use auto scaling to maintain capacity during instance failures. Monitor endpoint health and configure automatic instance replacement for failed instances.

title_full: MLREL02-BP02 Implement inference endpoint auto scaling
title: Implement inference endpoint auto scaling
description: Configure auto scaling for SageMaker endpoints based on invocation metrics such as InvocationsPerInstance or custom metrics. Set appropriate minimum and maximum instance counts to handle traffic variations. Use target tracking scaling policies for predictable scaling behavior.

title_full: MLREL02-BP03 Implement model fallback strategies for inference failures
title: Implement model fallback strategies for inference failures
description: Design fallback mechanisms for inference failures including timeouts and model errors. Implement multi-model endpoints or inference pipelines that can route to backup models. Define graceful degradation strategies such as returning cached predictions or default responses.

title_full: MLREL03-BP01 Maintain versioned backups of training data and models
title: Maintain versioned backups of training data and models
description: Implement versioned storage for training data, model artifacts, and configuration using Amazon S3 versioning. Enable cross-region replication for critical ML assets. Define retention policies that balance storage costs with the need to reproduce historical models.

title: Implement model rollback capabilities
description: Maintain the ability to quickly rollback to previous model versions when new deployments cause issues. Use SageMaker Model Registry to track model versions and approval status. Implement deployment automation that supports instant rollback to last known good model.

title_full: MLREL04-BP01 Monitor and manage service quotas for ML resources
title: Monitor and manage service quotas for ML resources
description: Monitor utilization of AWS service quotas for ML resources including SageMaker instance limits, S3 request rates, and API throttling limits. Use AWS Service Quotas to request increases before reaching limits. Implement quota usage dashboards and alerts.

title_full: MLREL04-BP02 Plan capacity for training and inference workloads
title: Plan capacity for training and inference workloads
description: Plan compute capacity for ML workloads including training job requirements and inference traffic patterns. Use SageMaker Savings Plans or Reserved Instances for predictable workloads. Consider using managed spot instances for training to reduce costs while maintaining capacity.

title_full: MLREL05-BP01 Test ML systems for failure scenarios
title: Test ML systems for failure scenarios
description: Conduct chaos engineering experiments to test ML system resilience including endpoint failures, data source unavailability, and model loading failures. Test rollback procedures and failover mechanisms. Document runbooks for common failure scenarios.

title_full: MLREL05-BP02 Validate model performance before production deployment
title: Validate model performance before production deployment
description: Implement comprehensive model validation including performance testing on holdout datasets, A/B testing against baseline models, and shadow deployments to compare new and existing models. Define minimum performance thresholds that must be met before production deployment.
